quotes.quote: When your nails are part of your outfit, they become more than nails. They become an accessory.
Any woman can wear a great outfit, but it is her nails that make the statement.
Nails are the period at the end of the sentence. They complete the look.
You can't buy happiness but you can get a mani and pedi and that's kind of the same thing.
A woman is helpless only while her nail polish is drying.
Having a manicure pulls a look together. Hands are the first thing people see after your face.
Maybe your life isn't sparkly but your nails can be.
You know you're a nail polish addict when you start matching your manicure to your outfits.
Life is not perfect, but your nails can be.
You're never fully dressed without a good manicure.
You're never full dressed without a good manicure.
When in doubt, paint your nails.
There's nothing a fresh manicure can't fix.

The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
Manicures which are basically just holding hands with a stranger for forty five minutes whilst listening to Enya.
I believe in manicures. I believe in overdressing. I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipsitck. I believe in pink. I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls.
